price: 26. Mpona baye bazali kosala bolamu, babombeli bango (lifuti) ya kitoko koleka na litabisi(1) mpe bilongi bia bango bikoyindaka na milinga te, mpe bikokitisama te. Bango nde bato ba Iola, bakovandaka libela kati na yango.
arabic: ۞ لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ وَزِيَادَةٞۖ وَلَا يَرۡهَقُ وُجُوهَهُمۡ قَتَرٞ وَلَا ذِلَّةٌۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna aḥsanū al-ḥus'nā waziyādatun walā yarhaqu wujūhahum qatarun walā dhillatun ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati hum fīhā khālidūna
